description: The contract is for a 5-year period, totalling $391,556.00. The deadline for submission of bids is 10:00 am ET on March 7, 2023.

full_summary:
### Official Tender Announcement
# Female Urinalysis Collection

## Notice Details

| **Field**                           | **Value**                                |
| ----------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| Reference Number                    | PW-23-01026152                           |
| Solicitation Number                 | 57101-23-4306376                         |
| Publication Date                     | February 16, 2023                        |
| Tender Closing Date                 | March 7, 2023, at 4:00 PM EST            |
| Tender Status                       | Expiré                                     |
| Goods and Services Code (G/SGIN)     | *G009F                                    |
| Procurement Category                 | SRV                                        |
| Procurement Method                   | Competitive - Open Bidding                |
| Notice Type                          | Request for Proposal                       |
| Regions of Opportunity              | Alberta                                   |
| Regions of Delivery                  | Alberta                                   |

## Contract Details

* The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) requires a Urinalysis Collection Program for the Edmonton, Alberta area.
* The program must be in compliance with the Corrections and Conditional Release Act, Corrections and Conditional Release Regulations, and Guidelines and Policy under the Act.
* Objectives:
	+ Collect, store, and ship urine samples.
	+ Forward the samples collected for lab testing for substance and alcohol use.
* Deliverables:
	+ Collector must collect urine samples from offenders and inmates who have been referred by the CSC.
	+ The contractor must perform these collections only in the designated Edmonton area parole office.

## Contract Duration and Time Frame for Delivery

* Period of the Contract: July 3, 2023 to June 30, 2028
* File Number: 57101-23-4306379
* Contracting Authority: Teri Fraser, 403-821-1749, Teri.Fraser@csc-scc.gc.ca

## Bidding Information

* Documents may be submitted in either English or French.
* Bidders may obtain the complete statement of work and evaluation criteria by downloading the solicitation document from Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.
* After contract award, bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process.

## Label Notice Information

* Label Notice Number: None
* Label Notice URL: None

## Document Information

* Documents available for download: None
* Attachment: None
